message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe it would be fair to propose a price of $11,500 for this exceptional item.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm very interested in the product, but $11,500 is a little steep for me. Would you consider $10,200?
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. To move forward, I'd like to propose a price of $10,750 for the product.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me. $10,750 is still a bit more than I was hoping to spend.  Could we settle on $10,400?
I understand your position, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, how about we agree on a price of $10,600?
Hi Alice, we are getting close.  Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $10,500?
